title: [Large-scale] Language Communication Skills Improvement Course Through Medical Simulation Role-Play

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic medical terminology and clinical process workflows
context.additional_context: Blended course for in-service healthcare professionals to enhance language communication skills through patient role-play simulations

learning_goals: Learners can accurately construct three-tier open-ended questions based on patient symptoms in a simulation environment.
Learners can complete diagnostic history-taking records with over 80% accuracy during role-playing scenarios.
Learners can improve communication strategies in three or more ways based on peer feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
